solution_line_template: He bought {copper_meters} + {plastic_more_than_copper} = <<{copper_meters}+{plastic_more_than_copper}={plastic_meters}>>{plastic_meters} meters of plastic pipe.
The total meters of the copper and plastic pipe is {copper_meters} + {plastic_meters} = <<{copper_meters}+{plastic_meters}={total_meters}>>{total_meters}.
The plumber spent ${cost_per_meter} x {total_meters} = $<<{cost_per_meter}*{total_meters}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} on copper and plastic pipe.
